localize.text: Can you read me? Is anyone there?
I am... an insider. Someone who knows a lot about the company.
Please understand that I cannot reveal my identity.
I will tell you the truth the company wants to hide.
Why do you think you’re hired by the company?
Are you satisfied with your job here?
Well, I can’t judge whether or not you're telling the truth.
You’re a manager, but you don’t actually know much about the company. Would you say I'm wrong?
I will make this as short as I can.
Contacting someone for a long period of time is dangerous.
